On Apr 20, 2007, at 1:40 PM, Ian Badcoe wrote:

> either my inv-abs function or else the
> piece-wise function

Hi Ian,

Can you provide the definitions of these two functions?

Isn't the non-linearity of the activation function important?   
Besides that, I tend to think that just about any NE algorithm could  
evolve around a wide range of activation functions (and, as  
previously discussed, activation algorithms).

Thanks,
Steve
--Apple-Mail-37--887576235
